name: Muong Thanh Hue Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel staff is superb from the minute we checked in to the time we checked out.
reviews.title: Excellent location and 4 star service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is excellent since we can find many local restaurants just right around the corner. The room is nice and roomy. Everything looks new too.
reviews.title: By far the BEST place to stay in Hue

reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here during our Vietnam vacation. Now I must admit, I was a little skeptical given the low price of the hotel as compared to the photos on their website. I was expecting the photos not to match the website (commonplace everywhere). However, all I have to say is…wow…the rooms were MUCH BETTER than what was on the website. I must say I could not find one fault with the hotel as the staff is exceptional and very helpful/friendly, the lobby is very nice, rooms were outstanding and very modern, location was excellent being next to the restaurant/nightlife area of Hue and the view from the bar at the top is very cool.
reviews.title: Unbelievable Value, Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Maybe we were there during the low season, because it did not appear to have many guests (probably partially due to the fact that it is a newer hotel). However, I assume this will change in time as this place is probably the best location and hotel for the price in town. I would HIGHLY recommend it to anyone traveling to Hue.
reviews.title: Highly Recommended and Will not Break the Bank

reviews.text: Well done to the management and the employees. Keep up with what you are doing there as the guests will be sure to follow.
reviews.title: Great Value
Nice base for a visit to wonderful Hué
reviews.text: Good value for money, although the service staff is nice but innefficient (long waiting time in any circumstance, whether cheking in, checking out, or just ordering drinks). Large, comfortable and absolutely clean rooms. Phonic insulation of windows is not too good: we heard every song of the karaoke bar next door until they closed.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Too bad the restaurant and bar were almost empty: this meant not a lot of atmosphere.
reviews.title: Great Hotel and Great Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only had one night to spend in Hue and based on Tripadvisor recommendations, we chose this hotel. It's been operating for a year so everything is new. We booked a river facing room on the 10th floor. The view was amazing.
reviews.title: Great value for money
Excellent Service and Location
reviews.text: As we were on a tight schedule, we couldn't do the standard tours offered. The ladies at reception in partcilular, a Ms Thuy went out of her way to make recommendations and suggestions. Through her efforts, we were able to go on a customised tour and were happy with the suggestions she recommended based on the limited time we had. This for us was the experience that set this hotel apart from others. We were truly impressed with this level of service and concern. It certainly didn't feel as though we were in another big hotel, they gave us a boutique hotel type of service.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is nicely decorated, the staff is warm hearted. We paid extra to upgrade to the luxury room, and it was worth it. The room is very spacious, and has a great view to the river and bridge. The room cleanness is also great.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel, but too high commission to book product.

reviews.text: The only thing to complain about the hotel is their overly high commission to book the book the product. They asked for $12 for one day city trip; we happened to enter the same agency the hotel uses, and their price is $5.5. We booked the airport pickup from the hotel with $4 per person, and was informed by agency that their price to hotel is $2.5. I am OK that hotel charge some service fee, but this is too much.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, excellent service, beautiful rooms and a lovely restaurant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is quite new and very comfortable. Rooms are quite spacious, in fact some of us were even upgraded to deluxe rooms. The restaurant which is open throughout the day, was amazing and the breakfast menu was also excellent. Staff were helpful and very warm and friendly. Hotel is situated at a corner and overlooks the river which is a spectacular view visible from the glass lift as you go up.
reviews.title: Brilliant accomodation but little atmosphere

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic room looking over the Perfume river, Friendly and supportive staff, Good and varied breakfast selection. The only downside was that the hotel was very quiet and there was a lack of buzz
reviews.title: beautiful view and beautiful price

reviews.text: This hotel really offers outstanding value. Located on the Perfume River and not far from the centre the hotel magnificent views of the river from the Sky Bar and some rooms this hotel offers spacious, modern rooms. The staff are friendly and very happy to accommodate your needs. Massage/spa are under construction when my wife and I stayed but staff recommended excellent, very cheap premises close by. When this area is completed it will only serve to enhance what is an excellent hotel. Staff and management are very receptive to suggestions. A must stay in Hue.
reviews.title: Amazingly Modern and Nice

reviews.text: My wife and older son stayed for two nights, we had not booked ahead and just chose the hotel as it was reccomended by a staff member from a hotel in Danang. We had previously looked at two other hotels in the area and their rooms.
reviews.title: Great Hotel in the best location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Once seeing the rooms in the Mecure we thought they were the best, very new and well laid out, the view was great as well.
reviews.title: Great views and a nice room in this business class hotel

reviews.text: The front desk staff were really very good and helped out so much with suggestions where to go and how to do it without spending a lot or getting caught in the tourist traps, probually the best help I have recieved in a Vietnam hotel.
reviews.title: Perfect service with a smile

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Not far from bars and restaraunts, had a great time.
reviews.title: New hotel with spacoius rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had 4 nights here in Feb 2011 and chose this hotel as we wanted to be able to relax around the pool during breaks from sightseeing. The hotel proved to be a good choice and whilst it was the most expensive stay of our visit to Vietnam, we were pleased with the location, the bedroom and yes, we did get to use the pool.
reviews.title: Mixed feelings.

description: Muong Thanh Hue Hotel (former name:Gerbera Hue Hotel) is a 108 contemporary-room hotel, located conveniently in the center of the city with a superb location by the river, the hotel provides an awe-inspiring panoramic view of the city of Hue, the picturesque Perfume River and Trang Tien Bridge from the hotel’s guestrooms.
